doc:
Constance Ford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Constance_Ford 0 Constance Ford (born Cornelia M. Ford; July 1, 1923 – February 26, 1993) was an American actress and model. She is best known for her long-running role as Ada Hobson on the daytime soap opera Another World. Constance_Ford ( born Cornelia_M._Ford ; July_1_,_1923 – February_26_,_1993 ) was an_American_actress_and_model . She is_best_known for her_long-running_role as Ada_Hobson on the_daytime_soap_opera Another_World .
